    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessFrame

        public ProcessFrame(ProcessSettings processSettings,
                    java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,MappedObjects> idMap)
        Takes in processSettings which tell about the various image processing settings during frame processing. idMap is the mapping of card ids to student ids and the mapping of options {W,X,Y,Z} to {A,B,C,D}
        Parameters:
        processSettings - ProcessSettings object specifying settings like adaptive thresholding, optionDisplay, idDisplay, card highlight and image inversion
        idMap - HashMap with actual id as key and MappedObjects as values. MappedObjects hold detected Id, mapped Id and ID specific option mapping

    • Method Detail

      • processThisFrame

        public StatsAndMat processThisFrame(Mat grayMat,
                                    Mat rgbaMat)
        Parameters:
        grayMat - grayscale matrix from the raw camera feed.
        rgbaMat - rgba matrix from the raw camera feed.
        Returns:
        StatsAndMat object that hold the question stats captured in a single camera frame along with the image matrix with card ID and Option

      • filterFrame

        private Mat filterFrame(Mat gray)
        filters the grayscale matrix to remove noise
        Parameters:
        gray - grayscale matrix of the camera feed
        Returns:
        filtered grayscale matrix

      • getContoursWithChild

        private java.util.List<MatOfPoint> getContoursWithChild(Mat filtered)
        Returns both the parent and child contours in cases where the parent has a child contour
        Parameters:
        filtered - filtered grayscale matrix
        Returns:
        list containing MatOfPoint describing individual contours (both parent and child)

      • populateUsefulContourList

        private java.util.List<GoodSquare> populateUsefulContourList(java.util.List<MatOfPoint> tempContours,
                                                             Mat filtered,
                                                             Mat colorMat)
        Returns only useful contours from among the parent-child contours returned from getContoursWithChild method
        Parameters:
        tempContours - List of parent-child contours
        filtered - filtered grayscale matrix
        colorMat - the rgba matrix from the camera feed
        Returns:
        a list of GoodSquare objects

      • getContourCenter

        private Point getContourCenter(MatOfPoint wrapper)
        Finds centroid of a contour defined by a given MatOfPoint
        Parameters:
        wrapper - MatOfPoint describing a contour
        Returns:
        center Point

      • centerFix

        private CenterObjects centerFix(Point p1,
                                Mat filtered)
        Repositions centroid to ensure that it is equidistant from all vertices
        Parameters:
        p1 - centroid Point calculated by getContourCenter method
        filtered - filtered grayscale matrix
        Returns:
        centerAndPoints(CenterObjects) containing center Point and x-y coordinates as well

      • getCentroid

        private Point getCentroid(Point p1,
                          Point p2,
                          Point p3)
        Gets the centroid of the triangle formed by the centers of the three squares grouped together on a single card
        Parameters:
        p1 - center of square 1
        p2 - center of square 2
        p3 - center of square 3
        Returns:
        centroid of triangle

      • rearrangePoints

        private Point[] rearrangePoints(Point p1,
                                Point p2,
                                Point p3,
                                Point hole)
        Rearranges points and always assign the same label to the centers of the three squares
        Parameters:
        p1 - center of square 1
        p2 - center of square 2
        p3 - center of square 3
        hole - center of the card
        Returns:
        array of Point containing set of rearranged points

      • decodeId

        private int decodeId(Point p1,
                     Point pivot,
                     Point p3,
                     Point hole,
                     Mat colorMat)
        Finds the card id
        Parameters:
        p1 - Point p1
        pivot - Point pivot (between p1 and p2)
        p3 - Point p3
        hole - Point hole (center of the card, also the midpoint of p1-p3
        colorMat - rgba Mat of the camera feed
        Returns:
        int idval i.e the decoded id

      • getIdCenter

        private Point getIdCenter(Point hole,
                          Point pivot)
        Locates the center of the id quadrant
        Parameters:
        hole - center Point of the card
        pivot - center of the square diagonally opposite id quadrant center
        Returns:
        center of the id quadrant

      • binary2decimal

        private int binary2decimal(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> tempIdList)
        Gets id value from the intensity values
        Parameters:
        tempIdList - list containing the intensity values at the 9 id points
        Returns:
        int card ID as calculated

      • decodeOption

        private java.lang.Object[] decodeOption(Point p1,
                                        Point pivot,
                                        Point p3,
                                        Point hole,
                                        Point centroid)
        Decodes option and fix p1, p2 position relative two pivot
        Parameters:
        p1 - Point p1
        pivot - Point pivot
        p3 - Point p3
        hole - Point hole (card center, triangle(p1-pivot-p3) hypotenuse midpoint)
        centroid - centroid of the triangle(p1-pivot-p3)
        Returns:
        object array with decoded option and rearranged points

      • groupNeighbors

        private java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<Point>> groupNeighbors(java.util.List<GoodSquare> goodSquareList)
        Groups detected contours in groups of three based on distance between them
        Parameters:
        goodSquareList - list of all the useful contours
        Returns:
        mapping of squares to cards

      • drawOptionsAndIds

        private Mat drawOptionsAndIds(Mat colorMat,
                              Mat filteredMat,
                              java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<Point>> groupedCenterList)
        Draws ID and option on the matrix
        Parameters:
        colorMat - rgba matrix
        filteredMat - filtered grayscale matrix
        groupedCenterList - list containing centers of squares belonging to same card
        Returns:
        rgba mat with id and options

      • getMappedOption

        private int getMappedOption(int option,
                            int id)
        Gets mapped option from {W,X,Y,Z} to {A,B,C,D} mapping
        Parameters:
        option - detected option
        id - detected id
        Returns:
        mapped option number
